body_html:
Just as an update, here and there are the complete logs when we run into errors. I do have some time lately so I could try to figure it out this week.

@junshi15 Any light shed on these logs?

Update: just as I looked into it, it appears to be caused by size mismatch:

F tensorflow/contrib/verbs/rdma.cc:786] Check failed: (buffer_size == size_ && rm.data_type_ != DT_STRING) || (buffer_size <= size_ && rm.data_type_ == DT_STRING) tensor and buffer size do not agree! buffer_size = 591 requested tensor size = 583Tensor<type: int64 shape: [0,1] values: >

I will try the patch in #10700 first and see if that could fix this issue.

Update: just as I looked into it, it appears to be caused by size mismatch:

body:
Just as an update, [here](https://gist.github.com/byronyi/52496c089b98bbe254f899742cf9bf93) and [there](https://gist.github.com/0942396aef46720d6791839e7423a9a3) are the complete logs when we run into errors. I do have some time lately so I could try to figure it out this week.

@junshi15 Any light shed on these logs?

Update: just as I looked into it, it appears to be caused by size mismatch:
```
F tensorflow/contrib/verbs/rdma.cc:786] Check failed: (buffer_size == size_ && rm.data_type_ != DT_STRING) || (buffer_size <= size_ && rm.data_type_ == DT_STRING) tensor and buffer size do not agree! buffer_size = 591 requested tensor size = 583Tensor<type: int64 shape: [0,1] values: >
```
I will try the patch in #10700 first and see if that could fix this issue.
